TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit WindowsRuntimeStreamExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class WindowsRuntimeStreamExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: 包含用于在 Windows 运行时中的流与适用于 Windows 应用商店应用的 .NET 的托管流之间进行转换的扩展方法。

span.span: Contains extension methods for converting between streams in the Windows Runtime and managed streams in the .NET for Windows Store apps.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些扩展方法仅在开发 Windows 应用商店应用程序后才可用。These extension methods are available only when you develop Windows Store apps. 方法提供使用 Windows 应用商店应用中的流的便捷方法。The methods provide convenient ways of working with streams in Windows Store apps. 不创建的实例`WindowsRuntimeStreamExtensions`类; 相反，使用这些方法的实例并接口和类。You do not create an instance of the `WindowsRuntimeStreamExtensions` class; instead, you use these methods from instances of the and interfaces and the class. `WindowsRuntimeStreamExtensions`类包含用于托管类型转换的两个方法到 Windows 运行时中的流对象：The `WindowsRuntimeStreamExtensions` class contains two methods for converting a managed object to a stream in the Windows Runtime: - - `WindowsRuntimeStreamExtensions`类包含用于转换到 Windows 运行时中的流的三个重载的方法对象：The `WindowsRuntimeStreamExtensions` class contains three overloaded methods for converting a stream in the Windows Runtime to a object: - - - 从.NET Framework 4.5.1`WindowsRuntimeStreamExtensions`类包含用于将流转换为 Windows 运行时方法:Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.1, the `WindowsRuntimeStreamExtensions` class contains a method for converting a stream to a Windows Runtime : - ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用和 The following example shows how to use the and [!code-csharp[windowsruntimestreamextensions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.windowsruntimestreamextensions/cs/blankpage.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[windowsruntimestreamextensions#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.windowsruntimestreamextensions/vb/blankpage.xaml.vb#2)] 下面是与前面的示例关联的 XAML 代码。Here's the XAML code that is associated with the previous example. [!code-xaml[windowsruntimestreamextensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.windowsruntimestreamextensions/cs/blankpage.xaml#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static Windows.Storage.Streams.IInputStream AsInputStream (this System.IO.Stream stream);
.method public static hidebysig class Windows.Storage.Streams.IInputStream AsInputStream(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed
static member AsInputStream : System.IO.Stream -> Windows.Storage.Streams.IInputStream

span.span: The stream to convert.

summary.span: 将适用于 Windows 应用商店应用的 .NET 中的托管流转换为 Windows 运行时中的输入流。

span.span: Converts a managed stream in the .NET for Windows Store apps to an input stream in the Windows Runtime.

returns.span: 表示转换流的 Windows 运行时 对象。

span.span: A Windows Runtime object that represents the converted stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Basic 中和C#，可以作为实例方法的类型 < System.IO.Stream > 任何对象上调用此方法。In Visual Basic and C#, you can call this method as an instance method on any object of type . 当使用实例方法语法调用此方法时，请省略第一个参数。When you use instance method syntax to call this method, omit the first parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展方法 (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md)或[扩展方法 (C#编程指南)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md)。For more information, see [Extension Methods (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md) or [Extension Methods (C# Programming Guide)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用`AsInputStream`和与 Windows 运行时中的流转换的托管的流的方法。The following example shows how to use the `AsInputStream` and methods to convert a managed stream to and from a stream in the Windows Runtime. [!code-csharp[windowsruntimestreamextensions#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.windowsruntimestreamextensions/cs/blankpage2.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[windowsruntimestreamextensions#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.windowsruntimestreamextensions/vb/blankpage2.xaml.vb#4)] 下面是与前面的示例关联的 XAML 代码。Here's the XAML code that is associated with the previous example. [!code-xaml[windowsruntimestreamextensions#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.windowsruntimestreamextensions/cs/blankpage2.xaml#3)]

span.span: is .
The stream does not support reading.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Basic 中和C#，可以为任何类型的对象上的实例方法调用此方法。In Visual Basic and C#, you can call this method as an instance method on any object of type . 当使用实例方法语法调用此方法时，请省略第一个参数。When you use instance method syntax to call this method, omit the first parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展方法 (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md)或[扩展方法 (C#编程指南)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md)。For more information, see [Extension Methods (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md) or [Extension Methods (C# Programming Guide)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md). 转换流时使用的默认缓冲区大小为 16,384 字节。A default buffer size of 16,384 bytes is used when converting the stream. 若要指定不同的缓冲区大小，请使用重载。To specify a different buffer size, use the overload.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.IO.Stream AsStream (this Windows.Storage.Streams.IRandomAccessStream windowsRuntimeStream, int bufferSize);
.method public static hidebysig class System.IO.Stream AsStream(class Windows.Storage.Streams.IRandomAccessStream windowsRuntimeStream, int32 bufferSize) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function AsStream (windowsRuntimeStream As IRandomAccessStream, bufferSize As Integer) As Stream
static member AsStream : Windows.Storage.Streams.IRandomAccessStream * int -> System.IO.Stream

param.name: windowsRuntimeStream
param.span: 要转换的 Windows 运行时 对象。

span.span: The Windows Runtime object to convert.

param.name: bufferSize
param.span: 缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The size, in bytes, of the buffer.

param.span: 此值不能为负，但是，它可以是（0）禁用缓冲的 0。

span.span: This value cannot be negative, but it can be 0 (zero) to disable buffering.

summary.span: 将 Windows 运行时中的随机访问流转换为适用于 Windows 应用商店应用的 .NET 中使用指定缓冲区大小的托管流。

span.span: Converts a random access stream in the Windows Runtime to a managed stream in the .NET for Windows Store apps using the specified buffer size.
The converted stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Basic 中和C#，可以为任何类型的对象上的实例方法调用此方法。In Visual Basic and C#, you can call this method as an instance method on any object of type . 当使用实例方法语法调用此方法时，请省略第一个参数。When you use instance method syntax to call this method, omit the first parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展方法 (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md)或[扩展方法 (C#编程指南)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md)。For more information, see [Extension Methods (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md) or [Extension Methods (C# Programming Guide)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md). 使用此方法来转换流时指定缓冲区大小。You use this method to specify a buffer size when converting the stream. 若要使用的 16,384 字节的默认缓冲区大小，使用重载。To use the default buffer size of 16,384 bytes, use the overload. 在大多数情况下，缓冲可以提高流操作的性能。In most situations, buffering improves the performance of stream operations. 您可以禁用缓冲处理通过设置`bufferSize`为零，但仅当你确信禁用缓冲是适用于你的情况时，才应执行此操作。You can disable buffering by setting `bufferSize` to zero, but you should do this only when you are sure that disabling buffering is appropriate for your situation.

span.span: is .
is negative.
